response.job_title: Associate Customer Adoption Manager en Coupa Software
response.summary:
Mechanical Engineer from the Universidad Nacional de Colombia with over 2 years of experience in Procurement-related roles within local, regional and global teams. Considerable knowledge in Strategic Sourcing processes, mainly for logistics services, as well as practical skills working with Source-To-Contract (S2C) softwares such as Zycus. Currently, as a Customer Adoption Manager, I help companies from multiple industries to successfully integrate Coupa's Source-To-Pay (S2P) solution in their day-to-day operations.

Strong interest in developing technical skills in areas related to Domain Specific Languages (DSLs), Sustainable Digital Transformation and Customer Success, especially within the automotive, chemical, agri-food and aerospace industries.

Excellent soft skills including: critical thinking, active listening, proactivity, adaptability and both solution and detail oriented. Fluent in Spanish, English, Portuguese and French.
response.skills: Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Excel, Autodesk Inventor, AutoCAD, Gestión de proyectos, Capacidad de análisis, Responsabilidad, Escucha activa, Compromiso, Autoaprendizaje, Toma de decisiones, Pensamiento crítico, Espíritu empresarial, Trabajo en equipo, Liderazgo

profile_positions.description:
- Provide support in developing, executing, and evaluating RFIs and RFPs for both the Road, Warehouse, and Intermodal (RWI) category, as well as the Bulk Marine and Terminals (BM&T) category.
- Provide support in negotiating and implementing commercial agreements with RWI suppliers in Mexico and Colombia.
- Implement and translate job aids for the use of S2C software in logistics services tenders, ensuring accessibility to Spanish and Portuguese-speaking users.
- Provide support in tracking regional macroeconomic indicators and market behavior, aligning them with purchasing strategies and periodically adjusting rates accordingly.
- Implement and train users on the RNDC platform and the SICE-TAC system, as required by the Ministry of Transportation of Colombia.
- Ensure compliance with Mexican transportation regulations by adapting legal requirements, such as the Carta Porte, for local operations.
profile_positions.title: LAA Strategic Sourcing Jumper - Logistics

profile_positions.description:
- Revisión de asistencia
- Recopilación de talleres e informes
profile_positions.title: Monitora de Plantas Térmicas

company.name: Coupa Software
company.description: Coupa Software is the cloud platform for business spend management (BSM). Coupa empowers companies around the world with the visibility and control they need to spend smarter and safer. To learn more about how Coupa can help you spend smarter, visit www.coupa.com. Read Coupa Blog https://www.coupa.com/blog/ or follow @Coupa on Twitter.
